name: carelog
description: A web application to manage and access electronic medical records. The platform allows doctors to view patient histories, add medical notes, and prescribe treatments, while patients can securely access their medical records, prescriptions, and appointment history anytime, anywhere.

scripts.migrate: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.seed: npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.resetDB: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all

author: raxelf
